definitions.definition: A system for activating combustion in a combustion engine .
Receptacle for a key used to start the engine in a vehicle.
examples: Put the key in the ignition and turn in right.

definitions.definition: The phenomenon of a thermonuclear fusion reaction becoming self-sustaining and no longer requiring external heating . English Wikipedia has an article on: fusion ignition Wikipedia

secondary_definitions: ( automotive , mechanical engineering ) A system for activating combustion in a combustion engine .
( automotive ) Receptacle for a key used to start the engine in a vehicle.
( physics ) The phenomenon of a thermonuclear fusion reaction becoming self-sustaining and no longer requiring external heating . English Wikipedia has an article on: fusion ignition Wikipedia
